entry.title: $2700 // --->Renovated--->Walk-In Closet--->30th Ave Rental
entry.content:
--->Renovated--->Walk-In Closet--->30th Ave Rental

Listing ID #: 169255
Address: 28-15 35th street, #1
Price: $2,700
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 975 Sq. Ft.
Floor: 1
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
NO FEE
Open View
Renovated
Walk In Closet

Located in the heart of Astoria. Gut renovated with all new finishes. Featuring brand new hardwood flooring throughout. The kitchen is an eat-in finished with new wood cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and stone counters. All new modern bath with glassed shower. Both bedrooms fit kings and 1 has a private en-suite walk-in or home office space great for additional storage. Spacious living room allows for bulky furniture. Heat & Hot water included.

Located in the heart of Astoria just steps from the 30th Avenue cafes, bars, and lounges. Tons of shopping is at your footstep. 3 minute walk to the subway and just a 7 minute commute to Midtown Manhattan.

***HALF MONTH FEE CHARGED TO THE TENANT***
 

Frank Bouklis

entry.title: $2675 // ------->BRIDGE VIEWS------->FULL LUXURY-------->NO FEE------->
entry.content:
------->BRIDGE VIEWS------->FULL LUXURY-------->NO FEE------->

Listing ID #: 167593
Price: $2,675
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Pets OK

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
Dishwasher
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Marble Bath
NO FEE
Washer

Brand new and NEVER LIVED IN the heart of Astoria. Featuring 6 inch wide plank flooring throughout the entire unit. There are floor to ceiling tinted glass windows in both the bedroom and living room bringing in tons of light. The bedroom fits a king and has a large wall to wall closet. The bathroom is finished with European marbling to the ceiling and a glassed deep soaking tub. Large closets throughout the apartment are custom shelved allowing for great storage. Central heating and cooling is controlled by you. Overlooking the RFK bridge from the bedroom and living room both.

Amenities include on site fitness center with sauna. Parking is in the building with elevator access to your floor. Video surveillance surveys the property and video intercom entry to all guests.

For viewings call Frank @ 646-335-6190 or email [email protected]

Contact you Astoria, Long Island City, Elmhurst, Woodside specialist today!
